text: Nan adarasi, e damuamin bizir faragha zuim, a kamakɨn. Dughiar ia akar dɨkɨrɨzim damuamim, ia pura Godɨn Nguibamɨn ziam dɨponan markɨ, egh guizbangɨra darɨgh nguazim o bizir igharazim dɨponan markɨ. Egh ia pura suam, “Kɨ guizbangɨra bizir kam damuam.” Egh suam, “Kɨ guizbangɨra bizir kam damuan kogham.” Egh ia uan akamɨn gɨn mangɨ. Ia mɨkɨmɨva guizbangɨra pɨn dɨboroghtɨ, eghtɨ God ivezir kuram ia danigam.
